text: (mesē tibiyadī) allāhgē mārgayehi kavurun (taman un hiṭi sthānaya athæra damā) piṭamaṁ vī yannēda, ohu bhūmiyehi sæpa pahasu apamaṇa sthānayanda, vividha sæpa sampatda at kara gannēya. kavurun hō tama nivasa athæra damā piṭamaṁ vī allāh desaṭada, ohugē dūtayā desaṭada yana mārgayehi miya giyahot ohugē vaṭinā phalavipāka niyata vaśayenma allāh kerehi anivāryaya vannēya. (mandayat mevænnanṭa) allāh itāmat pav kṣamā karanneku vaśayenda, dayāva pahaḷa karanneku vaśayenda siṭinnēya
